official_title: A bill to repeal chapter 45 of title 5, United States Code, relating to incentive awards for Federal employees.

summary.text: Repeals provisions of Federal law relating to incentive awards for Federal employees. Revives such provisions after any fiscal year in which the Government's receipts equal or exceed its outlays.

titles.title: A bill to repeal chapter 45 of title 5, United States Code, relating to incentive awards for Federal employees.
